ShadowSiren:BluntDamage.NAME: Blunt
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deals #b50% more damage to targets with #yBlock.

ShadowSiren:ElectricDamage.NAME: Electric
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Arcs to a random enemy on hit, dealing one third damage each arc. NL #yBlock: When attacking, deal a secondary 3 [ElectricIcon] damage. When attacked, deals 3 [ElectricIcon] damage back.
#yDamage: Arcs to a random enemy on hit, dealing one third damage each arc.
#yBlock: When attacking, deal a secondary 3 [ElectricIcon] damage. When attacked, deals 3 [ElectricIcon] damage back.

ShadowSiren:FireDamage.NAME: Fire
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Target loses Max HP equal to unblocked damage dealt. Deals up to #b25% more attack damage to targets with full HP. NL #yBlock: At the beginning of turn, gain #yVigor equal to this leftover Block.
#yDamage: Target loses Max HP equal to unblocked damage dealt. Deals up to #b25% more attack damage to targets with full HP.
#yBlock: At the beginning of turn, gain #yVigor equal to this leftover Block.

ShadowSiren:IceDamage.NAME: Ice
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Applies #yChill on hit. NL #yBlock: When you are attacked, applies #yChill to the attacker.
#yBlock: When you are attacked, applies #yChill to the attacker

ShadowSiren:ShadowDamage.NAME: Shadow
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Ignores #yBlock and applies #yShadow #ySplit instead of dealing damage. NL #yBlock: This Block is not lost at the beginning of turn.
#yDamage: Ignores #yBlock and applies #yShadow #ySplit instead of dealing damage.
#yBlock: This Block is not lost at the beginning of turn.

ShadowSiren:IceBlock.NAME: Ice Shield [IceIcon]
ShadowSiren:IceBlock.DESCRIPTION: When you are attacked, applies #yChill to the attacker.

ShadowSiren:StickyBlock.NAME: Sticky Block
ShadowSiren:StickyBlock.DESCRIPTION: Only reduced by #b1 at the start of turn.

ShadowSiren:FireBlock.NAME: Fire Shield [FireIcon]
ShadowSiren:FireBlock.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of turn, gain #yVigor equal to this leftover Block.

ShadowSiren:ShadowBlock.NAME: Shadow Shield [DarkIcon]
ShadowSiren:ShadowBlock.DESCRIPTION: This Block is not lost at the beginning of turn.

ShadowSiren:ElectricBlock.NAME: Electric Shield [ElectricIcon]
ShadowSiren:ElectricBlock.DESCRIPTION: When attacking, deal a secondary 3 [ElectricIcon] damage. When attacked, deals 3 [ElectricIcon] damage back.
